item.title: JAX-RS 2.0 pagination with Link header
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: Your REST API is looking good, everything is ready, but here comes a paginated resource. There could be various reasons to do it, be it search, listing, etc. In this matter several choices to implement that appear :
